email_notification.title: User is subscribed the email notification?

post.description: With the token received from this endpoint, a request can be made to the `user/password-reset` endpoint.

200.description: When this response is received, a password reset link is sent to the user's e-mail address

post.description: With the token received from this endpoint, a request can be made to the `user/verify-email` endpoint.

200.description: When this response is received, an email verification link will be sent to the user's email address.

 NOTE: if the avatar has not been uploaded, this value is null

login.description: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter and 1 special character and must be at least 8 characters

register.description: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter and 1 special character and must be at least 8 characters

reset-password.description: New password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter and 1 special character and must be at least 8 characters

change-password.description: New password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter and 1 special character and must be at least 8 characters

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme.
